title: Incredible transformation of sisters who shed 13 stone after ditching takeaways
text:

Two sisters who used to binge on unhealthy takeaway food have lost 13 stone in weight between them after ditching chips and kebabs.

Toni Fitzgerland, 28, and her older sister Rachel, 33, both from Dingle in Liverpool, loved to eat takeaway food but began to feel depressed about their weight.

Toni, who lived in Benidorm and worked in a nightclub, said she would finish work at 6am and polish off a portion of chips after every shift.

The health assistant told the Liverpool Echo : "I would have a chippy all the time and fast food because I was finishing work at 6am, because I worked in a nightclub called Hippodrome in Benidorm.

(Image: liverpoolecho.co.uk)

"I'd be in bed all day till I had to go back to work in the night time."

Rachel, a stay at home mum, used to gorge on meals like pasta with cheese piled on, and would come home and eat kebabs or five pieces of toast at once.

However, on New Year's Day 2016 Rachel decided to do something about her weight, and re-joined Slimming World.

Toni, who was also "so unhappy" about her weight, saw how well she was doing, and deciding to join the group while still in Spain.

Rachel said: "It was New Year's Day 2016 and I was so depressed and sad.

(Image: liverpoolecho.co.uk)

"You know how everyone says 'new year, new me'. I really wanted it, so decided to join Slimming World again."

Toni added: "I was living in Spain and was so unhappy about my weight, and when my sister started Slimming World I couldn't believe how well she was doing.

"So I joined in Spain and we helped each other - we used to Facetime every single day about our food and what we're eating.

"Then when I came home for good, me and my sister went to the gym together and we take dogs for walks and do everything together."

Rachel admitted she found the new healthy lifestyle difficult at first, and would "cry every night" in the beginning.

But with the support of her sister and mum, the 33-year-old lost an incredible eight stone.

(Image: liverpoolecho.co.uk)

She said: "She would scream at me to motivate me and say 'you can do it'.

"My sister would phone me from Benidorm and say 'you can'."

Toni - who has lost an amazing five stone - and her sister said they both had tried numerous diets in the past and slimming pills, without success.

The pair are now always in the gym and said they feel much happier and more confident, and "love going clothes shopping now".
description: Liverpool siblings Rachel and Toni Fitzgerald have supported each other to lose the weight with Slimming World
